api_list.name: Ligas
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pasecentral.p.rapidapi.com/api-football-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v2/leagues"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pasecentral.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
